// src/components/pipelines/BuildMetrics.jsx import React from 'react'; import { LineChart, Line, XAxis, YAxis, CartesianGrid, Tooltip, ResponsiveContainer } from 'recharts'; const BuildMetrics = ({ stats }) => { // Simulated build time data for the chart const buildTimeData = [ { time: '00:00', duration: 5.2, success: 95 }, { time: '04:00', duration: 6.1, success: 92 }, { time: '08:00', duration: 4.8, success: 97 }, { time: '12:00', duration: 5.5, success: 94 }, { time: '16:00', duration: 5.9, success: 91 }, { time: '20:00', duration: 5.0, success: 96 }, { time: '23:59', duration: 5.4, success: 93 } ]; return (

Build Metrics

Average Duration

{stats.averageDuration}

Success Rate

{stats.successRate}%

); }; export default BuildMetrics;
